Package com.example.qrcodeteam30

Class MyFirestoreUploadController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.qrcodeteam30.MyFirestoreUploadController
  • public class MyFirestoreUploadController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handling anything related to modify the Google Firestore database (on cloud) Because of the limitation of Android, unfortunately for the download part, it is integrated in the Activity (View) class, and we cannot separate it into its own class like this
